scripts.build-gateway: docker build -f devops/gateway.Dockerfile -t gateway . && docker tag gateway emansfsu/gateway && docker push emansfsu/gateway
scripts.build-websocket: docker build -f devops/websocket.Dockerfile -t websocket-demo . && docker tag websocket-demo emansfsu/websocket-demo && docker push emansfsu/websocket-demo
scripts.build-messanger: docker build -f devops/messanger.Dockerfile -t messanger-demo . && docker tag messanger-demo emansfsu/messanger-demo && docker push emansfsu/messanger-demo
scripts.build-frontend: docker build -f devops/frontend.Dockerfile -t react-demo . && docker tag react-demo emansfsu/react-demo && docker push emansfsu/react-demo
scripts.deploy: docker-compose -f devops/docker-compose.yml pull && docker stack deploy -c devops/docker-compose.yml message-app
